      • get

        public Object get(String serviceName,
                  Map<String,String> requestParams,
                  boolean hasPathParams,
                  String triggerPoint)
           throws RegBaseCheckedException,
                  org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException,
                  SocketTimeoutException
        Prepare GET request.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - service to be invoked
        requestParams - parameters along with url
        hasPathParams - the has path params
        triggerPoint - system or user driven invocation
        Returns:
        Object requiredType of object response Body
        Throws:
        RegBaseCheckedException - generalised exception with errorCode and errorMessage
        org.springframework.web.client.HttpClientErrorException - when client error exception from server
        SocketTimeoutException - the socket timeout exception
        org.springframework.web.client.HttpServerErrorException - when server exception from server

        SocketTimeoutException - the socket timeout exception
        org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - the resource access exception
